Dear Bill & Bob,

Please stay out of the cockpit.

I know you like going into space, but you don't have to commander every vessel launched, you're not a pilot.

Please sit in the back row where you belong until we arrive wherever they're sending us.

Sincerely,

Jeb

Crew Manifest lets you swap Kerbals on the pad.

Sticking a probe core on everything means you don't need pilots and can use those seats for useful scientists and engineers.

Also check on what the root part of the ship is. If your root is a cockpit, I find that Kerbals tend to jump in surreptitiously. If the root part is something else, the cockpit often remains empty even if you meant to have crew in it.
